definition: Hwang Jang-yop (1923-2010), North Korean politician known for defecting to South Korea
surname Huang or Hwang
yellow/pornographic/to fall through
length/long/forever/always/constantly
chief/head/elder/to grow/to develop/to increase/to enhance
blaze of fire/glorious
variant of 燁|烨[ye4]

sentences.english: He later became a fierce critic of the North.
sentences.chinese: 后来，黄长烨激烈批评北韩。

sentences.english: The former politician defected to South Korea in 1997
sentences.chinese: 前政治家黄长烨于1997年叛逃到韩国。
